title: Check out the recap Offset and FaZe Swagg’s epic Madden 24 Livestream
description: FaZe Swagg issued a challenge, and Offset answered! Find out what happens when two gaming titans face off in a Madden 24 grudge match for the ages. And after the games watch he exclusive interviews to find out what makes them stay on top of their games. If you missed the livestream, check out the recap or the full livestream on YouTube

title: Cyberpunk 2077's New Ending [SPOILERS]
description: Along with a new story campaign, Cyberpunk 2077 Phantom Liberty adds a new ending to the main story. Here's how it plays out.

title: Firearms Expert Reacts To Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty’s Guns
description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down more of the weaponry of Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty, including the Warden, HR4-GRIT and Her Majesty.
